ANGULAR_DESCRIPTION: This is a sample application demonstrating i18n in Angular.
CLI_COMMANDS_ANGULAR_DESCRIPTION: Use the following commands to create and serve an Angular application.
SERVE_APP: Serves the app locally for development
I18N_DESCRIPTION: This section demonstrates how to use i18n in Angular.
CLI_COMMANDS_I18N_DESCRIPTION: Use the following commands to add and configure i18n in your Angular application.
ADD_I18N: Adds i18n support to your Angular app
GENERATE_COMPONENT: Generates a component with i18n setup
SERVE_LANGUAGE: Serve the app in a specific language (e.g., French)
CLI_COMMANDS_TRANSLATE_DESCRIPTION: Use the following command to install ngx-translate in your Angular application.
